column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////The one dish we saw recommenced on yelp over and over was the pig candy so we got that to start. The smell of it was just horrible. I am 32 weeks pregnant and was barely able to get it to my mouth
column2: but once I did I really enjoyed the taste. My husband couldn't stand the smell either
column3: but it probably wasn't as bad for him as he isn't pregnant lol. Anyways
column4: it was hard to eat for both us even though it tasted good
column5: because the small was so so horrible.
